bibl.title: Underwater Archaeology in the Canopic Region in Egypt. The Topography and Excavation of Heracleion-Thonis and East Canopus (1996-2006). Translated by Ludwig VON BOMHARD. (Oxford Centre for Maritime Archaeology. Monograph 1.)
bibl.note: nombr. figg., cartes, plans n./bl. et coul.

Pp. xiv: Barry CUNLIFFE, Preface; - xv: Jonathan COLE, Editor's Preface. - 1. Introduction: The Canopic region - presentation of the project. - 2. The ancient topography of the Canopic region - East Canopus. - 3. Heracleion. - Bibliography. Index.
